sentences.sContent: Scurrilous and untrue stories were being invented.
sentences.sCn: 有人正在编造虚假诽谤的故事。

synos.tran: 下流的；说话粗鄙恶劣的；无礼的

remMethod.val: scurril(下流) + ous → 下流的； 和scurry(v. 急奔)一起记

words.tran: 下流；刻薄嘴；谈吐卑劣粗俗

trans.tranOther: Scurrilous accusations or stories are untrue and unfair, and are likely to damage the reputation of the person that they relate to
